mapper.select: /* user.selectInterrelatedList */ SELECT INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE , INTERRELATED_NM FROM T_CO_INTERRELATED WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY INTERRELATED_NM
/* user.selectUserList_count */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_CO_USER A INNER JOIN T_CO_INTERRELATED B ON A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE = B.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE

/* user.selectUserList */ SELECT A.USER_NAME , A.USER_ID , A.USER_POSITION , A.DEPT_NAME , A.USER_TEL , A.USER_HP , CASE WHEN A.USER_AUTH = '1' THEN '시스템관리자' WHEN A.USER_AUTH = '2' THEN '각사관리자' WHEN A.USER_AUTH = '3' THEN '일반사용자' WHEN A.USER_AUTH = '4' THEN '감사사용자' END AS USER_AUTH , CASE WHEN A.USE_YN = 'Y' THEN '사용' WHEN A.USE_YN = 'N' THEN '미사용' END AS USE_YN , B.INTERRELATED_NM FROM T_CO_USER A INNER JOIN T_CO_INTERRELATED B ON A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE = B.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE
ORDER BY A.CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT ${offset}, ${pageSize}

/* user.selectUserDetail */ SELECT A.USER_ID , A.USER_NAME , A.USER_POSITION , A.DEPT_NAME , A.USER_TEL , A.USER_HP , A.USER_AUTH , A.USE_YN , A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE , IFNULL(A.OPENAUTH, '') AS OPENAUTH , IFNULL(A.BIDAUTH, '') AS BIDAUTH , A.USER_EMAIL , DATE_FORMAT(A.PWD_EDIT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PWD_EDIT_DATE_STR , B.INTERRELATED_NM FROM T_CO_USER A INNER JOIN T_CO_INTERRELATED B ON A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE = B.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}

/* user.selectInterrelatedListByUser */ SELECT A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE , INTERRELATED_NM FROM T_CO_INTERRELATED A INNER JOIN T_CO_USER_INTERRELATED B ON A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE = B.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE
mapper.insert: /* user.insertUserSave */ INSERT INTO T_CO_USER ( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE, USER_AUTH , OPENAUTH, BIDAUTH, USER_HP, USER_TEL, USER_EMAIL , USER_POSITION, DEPT_NAME, USE_YN, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, PWD_EDIT_DATE, PWD_EDIT_YN) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{encodedPassword}, #{userName}, #{interrelatedCustCode}, #{userAuth} , #{openauth}, #{bidauth}, #{userHp}, #{userTel}, #{userEmail} , #{userPosition}, #{deptName}, #{useYn}, #{updateUser}, now() , #{updateUser}, now(), now(), 'N')
mapper.delete: /* user.deleteUserInterrelated */ DELETE FROM T_CO_USER_INTERRELATED WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: /* user.selectTCoCustUserDetail */ SELECT USER_NAME , USER_ID , USER_BUSEO , USER_POSITION , USER_EMAIL , USER_TEL , USER_HP , USER_TYPE , USE_YN FROM T_CO_CUST_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
